products.title: Appilot
products.description: AppPilot streamlines app development with intuitive tools and real-time collaboration

projectDetails.overview: AppPilot revolutionizes the app development process by providing a comprehensive platform that combines intuitive design tools with powerful collaboration features. Built for modern development teams, it bridges the gap between design and development.
projectDetails.targetAudience: Mobile app developers, UI/UX designers, startup teams, and software development agencies

products.title: Ttinit
products.description: Turbocharge your TikTok Shop affiliate outreach. Better results and effortless management.

projectDetails.overview: Ttinit is a powerful marketing automation platform specifically designed for TikTok Shop affiliate marketing. It streamlines the entire process from influencer discovery to campaign management, making affiliate marketing more efficient and profitable.
projectDetails.targetAudience: E-commerce brands, affiliate marketers, social media managers, and TikTok Shop sellers

products.title: BITBOT
products.description: BITBOT enforces distraction-free deep work hours in Slack by scheduling non-urgent messages and supporting urgent overrides with audit trails.

projectDetails.overview: BITBOT is an intelligent Slack bot that promotes deep work culture by managing message flow during focused work hours. It intelligently schedules non-urgent messages while allowing urgent communications through with proper audit trails and team transparency.
projectDetails.targetAudience: Remote teams, knowledge workers, software development teams, and productivity-focused organizations

products.title: BITLINK
products.description: Bridge WhatsApp, Telegram, and Discord into Slack with two-way, real-time communication.

projectDetails.overview: BITLINK creates a seamless communication bridge between popular messaging platforms (WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord) and Slack. It enables teams to maintain centralized communication while staying connected with clients and communities across different platforms without switching contexts.
projectDetails.targetAudience: Remote teams, customer support teams, community managers, and businesses with multi-platform communication needs
benefits: Improves response time and team efficiency
